summary: Anonymous site where all users have full access (no authorization checks enforced).
architectural_notes: Project requirement: site is anonymous; backend should not enforce user roles/authorization checks for core actions.
known_issues: Authorization checks are currently (re)appearing/enforced, blocking anonymous full access.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/disable backend authorization checks so the site is fully anonymous with full access for everyone.

Remove/disable all backend authorization enforcement so anonymous callers (unauthenticated principals) have full access to all canister functionality, including creating ponds/posts/ribbits, liking, joining/leaving ponds, username management, profile read/write, view count increments, and admin-only utilities.

Preserve frontend compatibility by keeping existing access-control-related Candid methods present in the backend interface (e.g., initializeAccessControl, getCallerUserRole, assignCallerUserRole, isCallerAdmin), but ensure they do not gate or block any functionality in an anonymous mode.

projectName: Disable backend authorization so Ribbit is fully anonymous with full access
